name: Garboland 3D! - Post-Jam Ultimate Edition
description:
Lose yourself, find your Keys! 

You're the newest (and first) resident of Garboland 3D! But in a rush to get the game built in time, the developer accidentally rendered your keys with a bunch fo default cubes!
You're gonna have to use random guns to clear out all this garbage, and find your keys before the dev gives up and goes back to Unity 2D!

The third game in my series of Garbo game jam games, this was created for the 2021 Global Game Jam Online! this is my submission with some post-release patches :P

-----------------------------

Controls:

WASD - Move
Q and E - Switch weapons
Right Click - Pickup/Interact
Shift - Sprint
Mouse - Control Camera
Left Click - Fire.

-----------------------------------------------------------

Sound Effects from https://freesfx.co.uk/,
Music is "Le Grand Chase" by Kevin Macleod, from  https://incompetech.com/.
